Class StaffCampController

    • create

      public String create(String staffInChargeID)
      Creates new Camp using StaffID
      Parameters:
      staffInChargeID - The unique ID of the Staff in Charge of Camp
      Returns:
      campID of created camp

    • delete

      public void delete(String campID) throws EditCampException
      Deletes Camp from Database
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      Throws:
      EditCampException - when students are registered to the camp

    • changeName

      public void changeName(String campID, String newName) throws EditCampException
      Changes Name of Camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      newName - The new name of the Camp
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp name is not unique or length of camp name is too short

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility(String campID, boolean visibility) throws EditCampException
      toggles the visibility of the camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      visibility - The visibility of the camp
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp already has students registered

    • changeStartDate

      public void changeStartDate(String campID, String date) throws InvalidDateException
      Change start Date of Camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      date - The start date of the Camp
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - if start date does not follow order of Today -> Registration Closing Date -> Start Date -> End Date

    • changeEndDate

      public void changeEndDate(String campID, String date) throws InvalidDateException
      Change end date of camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      date - The end date of the Camp
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - if end date does not follow order of Today -> Registration Closing Date -> Start Date -> End Date

    • changeLocation

      public void changeLocation(String campID, String location) throws EditCampException
      Changes location of camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      location - The new location of the Camp
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp location is blank

    • changeDescription

      public void changeDescription(String campID, String description) throws EditCampException
      Change description of camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      description - The new description for the Camp
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp description is blank

    • changeFaculty

      public void changeFaculty(String staffID, String campID, boolean openToFacultyOnly) throws EditCampException
      Allows staff to change faculty of camp between own faculty and NTU

      Checks whether camp contains students from other faculties when open to staff faculty instead of whole NTU

      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID for the Camp
      staffID - The unique ID for the Staff
      openToFacultyOnly - boolean value of whether camp is open to faculty only or open to NTU
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp currently contains students not from staff faculty

    • changeCampCommSlots

      public void changeCampCommSlots(String campID, int slots) throws EditCampException
      Change camp committee slots for camp

      checks for error when downsizing the camp committee slots

      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      slots - The total number of Camp Committee slots
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp committee slots not within range 1-10,

      and slots smaller than number of camp committee members registered

    • changeCampParticipantSlots

      public void changeCampParticipantSlots(String campID, int slots) throws EditCampException
      Change camp partcipant slots for camp

      Checks for error when downsizing the camp participant slots

      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      slots - The total number of Camp Participant slots
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp participant slots is not at least 1

      and slots smaller than number of camp participant members registered

    • changeClosingDate

      public void changeClosingDate(String campID, String date) throws InvalidDateException
      Change registration closing date of camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      date - The closing registration date
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - if closing date does not follow order of Today -> Registration Closing Date -> Start Date -> End Date
